data.name: tanxy
data.detailed_description:
WHAT? tanxy is a game where you can program. In contrast to other games where you control your Units with keyboard and mouse, in tanxy you can write a JavaScript program to control any Unit on your behalf. Although manual control is also possible. Your goal is to destroy all enemy Units and to keep yours.

WHY? JavaScript is the most popular programming language on this planet. If you have a kid who should be motivated to learn programming, tanxy could be a good option. If you are a programmer who wants to learn JavaScript with fun, tanxy is an option, too.

HOW? You develop Tank control algorithms, you implement them in JavaScript, load them to Tanks and see how they fight.

data.short_description: tanxy is a game where you can program. In tanxy you can write a JavaScript program to control any Unit on your behalf. Manual control is also possible. Your goal is to destroy all enemy Units and to keep yours.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If you have Intel Graphics: we support 6th generation (6xxx processors) or newer only.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If you have Intel Graphics: we support 6th generation (6xxx processors) or newer only.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.9
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If you have Intel Graphics: we support 6th generation (6xxx processors) or newer only.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: To enable manual control for Units go to System Preferences → 'Security & Privacy' → 'Privacy'. Select 'Input Monitoring' in the list on the left side and check 'tanxy' on the right.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 11.x
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If you have Intel Graphics: we support 6th generation (6xxx processors) or newer only.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: To enable manual control for Units go to System Preferences → 'Security & Privacy' → 'Privacy'. Select 'Input Monitoring' in the list on the left side and check 'tanxy' on the right.
